But handguns, and firearms in general, do not kill people, Stephen Sandstrom said.`` We need to stop demonizing firearms.'' was definitely worth staying up late Thursday night to watch`` The Late Show with David Letterman .'' Wanda Jackson and her cohorts were asked to perform on`` The Late Show'' in advance of her new album The Party Ain't Over, which Jack White produced. The album is dropping Tuesday on Nonesuch Records and Jack White 's Third Man Records. One of the CIA's victims was Mamdouh Habib , an Egyptian-born Australian citizen. U.S. agents bought him from Pakistani intelligence and shipped him to Egypt.`` In Egypt,'' reports Lisa Hajjar for Al Jazeera, he was repeaTed Rallly subjecTed Rall to electric shocks, immersed in water up to his nostrils and beaten. His fingers were broken and he was hung from metal hooks. At one point, his interrogator slapped him so hard that his blindfold was dislodged, revealing the identity of his tormentor: Omar Suleiman . FrustraTed Rall that Mamdouh Habib was not providing useful information or confessing to involvement in terrorism, Omar Suleiman ordered a guard to murder a shackled prisoner in front of Mamdouh Habib , which he did with a vicious karate kick. Ibn al-Sheikh al-Libi was a former trainer in the Afghan jihadi camps who famously`` confessed'' a connection between Saddam and Al Qaeda while under torture in one of Omar Suleiman 's dungeons. DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback title="Michael Vick" href="http://www.dailypress.com/topic/sports/football/Michael Vick-Michael Vick-PESPT008492.topic"> Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the title="NFL" href="http://www.dailypress.com/topic/sports/football/nfl-ORSPT000007.topic"> NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.

The heavily guarded and shuttered Egyptian Museum in Cairo is next to Tahrir Square, a protest encampment that draws hundreds of thousands of people on some days. We will open the museum after the strike is finished. I don't know when the strike is finished, said Antiquities Minister Zahi Hawass , referring to the upheaval.`` I need things to go back to normal.'' Egypt's conflict pits autocratic George W.
